add(uint256,address,uint32,uint16,uint16.details: Can only be called by the owner. DO NOT add the same token more than once. Rewards will be messed up if you do.

params.allocPoint: Number of allocation points to allot to this token/pool
params.sushiPid: The pid of the Sushiswap pool in the Masterchef contract (if exists, otherwise provide zero)
params.token: The token that will be staked for rewards
params.vestingCliff: The number of days for the vesting cliff
params.vestingPercent: The percentage of rewards from this pool that will vest
params.vestingPeriod: The number of days for the vesting period
params.vpForDeposit: If true, users get voting power for deposits
params.vpForVesting: If true, users get voting power for vesting balances
params.withUpdate: if specified, update all pools before adding new pool

changeOwner(address).details: Can only be called by the owner

params._rewardToken: address of token that is being offered as a reward
params._rewardTokensPerBlock: initial amount of reward tokens to be distributed per block
params._startBlock: block number when rewards will start

depositWithPermit(uint256,uint256,uint25.details: It is up to the frontend developer to ensure the pool token implements permit - otherwise this will fail

params.deadline: The time at which to expire the signature
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature

rescueTokens(address[],uint256[],address.details: Can only be called by the owner

params.amounts: the amount of each token to withdraw.  If zero, withdraws the maximum allowed amount for each token
params.receiver: the address that will receive the tokens

set(uint256,uint256,bool).details: Can only be called by the owner

params.allocPoint: New number of allocation points for pool
params.withUpdate: if specified, update all pools before setting allocation points

setMasterChef(address).details: Can only be called by the owner

setRewardsPerBlock(uint256).details: Can only be called by the owner

params.newRewardTokensPerBlock: new amount of reward token to reward each block

setSushiToken(address).details: Can only be called by the owner

tokenAllow(address[],uint256[],address).details: Can only be called by the owner

params.spender: the address to allow spending of token

ChangedAddress(string,address,address).notice: Event emitted when contract address is changed

ChangedOwner(address,address).notice: Event emitted when the owner of the rewards manager contract is updated

ChangedRewardTokensPerBlock(uint256,uint.notice: Event emitted when the amount of reward tokens per block is updated

Deposit(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Event emitted when a user deposits funds in the rewards manager

EmergencyWithdraw(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds from the rewards manager without claiming rewards

PoolAdded(uint256,address,uint256,uint25.notice: Event emitted when new pool is added to the rewards manager

PoolUpdated(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Event emitted when pool allocation points are updated

SetRewardsStartBlock(uint256).notice: Event emitted when the rewards start block is set

Withdraw(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager

add(uint256,address,uint32,uint16,uint16.notice: Add a new reward token to the pool

changeOwner(address).notice: Change owner of Rewards Manager contract

constructor.notice: Create a new Rewards Manager contract

deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit tokens to RewardsManager for rewards allocation.

depositWithPermit(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Deposit tokens to RewardsManager for rewards allocation, using permit for approval

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY.

getMultiplier(uint256,uint256).notice: Return reward multiplier over the given from to to block.

massUpdatePools().notice: Update reward variables for all pools

pendingRewardTokens(uint256,address).notice: View function to see pending reward tokens on frontend.

pendingSushi(uint256,address).notice: View function to see pending SUSHI on frontend.

poolLength().notice: View function to see current poolInfo array length

rescueTokens(address[],uint256[],address.notice: Rescue (withdraw) tokens from the smart contract

rewardsActive().notice: Returns true if rewards are actively being accumulated

set(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Update the given pool's allocation points

startBlock().notice: The block number when rewards start.

sushiPools(address).notice: Mapping of Sushi tokens to MasterChef pids

tokenAllow(address[],uint256[],address).notice: Set approvals for external addresses to use contract tokens

totalAllocPoint().notice: Total allocation points. Must be the sum of all allocation points in all pools.

updatePool(uint256).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool to be up-to-date

userInfo(uint256,address).notice: Info of each user that stakes tokens.

withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw tokens from RewardsManager, claiming rewards.
